description: An innocent family reunion descends into all-out chaos when simmering resentment and unspoken animosities rise to the surface . Every year the Best and the Black families gather to fire up the grill, dust off the horseshoes, and
name: Family Reunion: The Movie

review.name: I movie was amazing
review.reviewBody: I really enjoyed this movie are there anymore like it I can rent? I really enjoyed the characters, the acting and the set design. Will there be a Family Reunion part 2? If so I am sure it will be a hit. I really enjoyed the two big boy and Bebe drake she is one of my favorite actresses. I think the movie could have had more music the score was fine but the sound track was so good it let me wanting more. Does anyone know where I can get a copy on the music? This movie is definitely a sleeper I am surprised that it wasn't theatrically released. I think there might have been a platform release because I remember seeing the title in the movie theater. This move would have been perfect on the big screen.
